headline: Invitation Homes Acquires ResiBuilt to Enhance Development Capabilities and Deliver More Housing Solutions for American Families
summary: DALLAS, January 16, 2026--Invitation Homes Inc. (NYSE: INVH) ("Invitation Homes" or the "Company"), the nation's premier single-family home leasing and management company, announced today its acquisition of ResiBuilt Homes, LLC ("ResiBuilt"), a leading build-to-rent ("BTR") developer in high-growth markets across the Southeast.
